name: price-list-block-zebra
description: A wordpress block for creating price lists. You can use it to create a menu for a restaurant, prices for a barber shop or anything like it. All editing is done inside the block editor. No confusing menus, no settings. Just easy to use!
author: Rob Monhemius

scripts.lint: wp-scripts lint-pkg-json || wp-scripts lint-style || wp-scripts lint-js
scripts.start: wp-scripts build && wp-env start && wp-scripts start
scripts.create-translation-file: wp-env run cli wp i18n make-pot ./wp-content/plugins/price-list-block-zebra ./wp-content/plugins/price-list-block-zebra/src/i18n/default.pot
